intro.title: Introduction
intro.content: We value your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and protect information about you when you use our website.

data.title: Data Collection
data.content: We may collect the following information:
items: Technical data (IP address, browser type, operating system)
Information you voluntarily provide (if you contact us)

cookies.title: Use of Cookies
cookies.content: Our website uses cookies to improve user experience and analyze traffic. Detailed information is available in our Cookie Policy.

thirdParty.title: Third Parties
thirdParty.content: We may use third-party services such as Google Analytics and advertising networks that may collect information about your use of the site.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.content: You have the right to request access, correction, or deletion of your personal data. To do so, please contact us through the contact page.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: If you have questions about this privacy policy, please contact us through the contact page.
